body_html: @bhack Could you make explicit your suggested API change? Note that warm-starting accumulators is definitely inadvisable in many settings (given that new vocabulary entries have newly initialized accumulators), which is why we made the choice for the default to not include them.
body_text: @bhack Could you make explicit your suggested API change?  Note that warm-starting accumulators is definitely inadvisable in many settings (given that new vocabulary entries have newly initialized accumulators), which is why we made the choice for the default to not include them.
body: @bhack Could you make explicit your suggested API change?  Note that warm-starting accumulators is definitely inadvisable in many settings (given that new vocabulary entries have newly initialized accumulators), which is why we made the choice for the default to not include them.
